text: Eduard Skornyakov (born 1980) is a Russian sailor. He competed at the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing, where he placed 17th in the Finn class. He competed in the same class at the 2012 Summer Olympics, finishing in 17th again. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Russia Category:Sailors at the 2008 Summer Olympics – Finn Category:Sailors at the 2012 Summer Olympics – Finn
title: Eduard Skornyakov
